story_11_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Alola!
I guess we’re your first match!
story_11_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
My name’s Hau, and this is Sophocles!
We’re buddies from Alola!
story_11_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
H-hi... I’m Sophocles...
I’m a Captain back home...
story_11_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Loosen up, Sophocles!
Just do it like we always do!
story_11_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
OK... I’m sorry...
I just g-get so nervous...
story_11_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
You’re right, though... How often do you
get the chance to battle against s-so many
different Trainers like this...
story_11_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Yeah! I’m super excited, too!
But since we’re here, let’s aim for the top!
story_11_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
That’s the spirit!
I’m gonna go all out, too!
story_11_01000/2401_0301_1000_10: I’m not gonna just let you win!
story_11_01000/2401_0401_1100_10: Yeah! That’s what I like to hear!
story_11_01000/2401_0302_1200_10: That championship is gonna be ours!
story_11_01000/2401_0402_1300_10: Yeah! That’s what I like to hear!
story_11_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
All right, let’s get this started!
Let’s do this, Sophocles!
